TITLE: Blockly for WeDo
VALUE_CHANGED: N.B. Your value has been changed from %1 to %2
BAD_VAR_NAME: N.B. Variable names must start with a letter, and contain only letters, numbers or underscores
RESERVED_VAR_NAME: N.B. The name %1 is already used
BLOCKS_IGNORED: N.B. Any blocks not connected to a start block have been ignored
NO_START_BLOCK: N.B. There is no start block, so no code has been generated
MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Messages sent by "display" blocks will appear here
LOSE_CHANGES_WARNING: You will lose any changes you have made to your program
MERGE_PROMPT: Do you want to merge the new project with your existing project?
